text: Peter Mather (born 9 September 1953) is a British fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Mather studied at Fitzwilliam College, Cambridge. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:British male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Great Britain Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Alumni of Fitzwilliam College, Cambridge
title: Peter Mather
